dynamic_line: Hi? Its been a while since I see a living human walk straight into me!

responses.text: We need your help in operating a radio tower.

dynamic_line: Radios are too simple to use, so why would you want me to do it myself?

responses.text: Increase the efficiency of our radio?
Its a complicated thing for us...

dynamic_line.no: Forget it, I will come for as long as I gain benefits from doing this crap!
